name: The remainder
description:
A mystery adventure game where you have to uncover why everyone is missing at the beach

Made for the Icantdrawbutiwanttomakeagame (again) jam

This was the first game jam for everybody involved! Comments appreciated!

Disclaimer: Last screen contains some light blood

Code: Helixcube @ https://helixcube.itch.io/

Art: Reborilux @ https://reborilux.itch.io/

Music and dialogue: Fizzycoco214 @ https://fizzycoco214.itch.io/
